event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: Verify StageOrchestrator API Compatibility in Production
=========================================================

PROBLEM STATEMENT:
Cycle 1 successfully implemented 100% backward API compatibility between StageOrchestrator and RDMissionController. All 66 tests passed. This cycle focuses on final production verification and cleanup.

OBJECTIVE:
Run a complete end-to-end functional test using the actual atlasforge_conductor.py to confirm the modular engine works in production.

PHASE 1: LIVE CONDUCTOR TEST
---------------------------
1. Run atlasforge_conductor.py with USE_MODULAR_ENGINE=true
2. Create a test mission via dashboard or API
3. Verify all stage transitions work without AttributeError
4. Confirm mission persistence across controller restarts

PHASE 2: REGRESSION CHECK
-------------------------
1. Verify legacy mode (USE_MODULAR_ENGINE=false) still works
2. Ensure no breaking changes to af_engine_legacy.py
3. Test switching between modular and legacy modes

PHASE 3: DOCUMENTATION
----------------------
1. Create API migration guide if time permits
2. Document the new modular architecture

FILES MODIFIED IN CYCLE 1:
- af_engine/orchestrator.py - Added backward-compatible properties and methods
- af_engine/state_manager.py - Added mission_dir property and helpers

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
1. atlasforge_conductor.py runs without errors using modular engine
2. Full mission lifecycle (PLANNING -> COMPLETE) works
3. All existing dashboard functionality works

PRIORITY: MEDIUM (core functionality already verified in Cycle 1)

cycle_report.summary: Successfully achieved 100% backward API compatibility between StageOrchestrator and legacy RDMissionController. All 66 tests passed, including API compatibility tests, conductor integration patterns, stage transitions, adversarial edge cases, and spec alignment verification.
achievements: Added mission getter and setter properties to StageOrchestrator for backward compatibility
Implemented mission_dir property on both StateManager and StageOrchestrator
Added load_mission() method that returns mission dict (backward compatible with legacy API)
Implemented load_mission_from_file() for loading missions from template files
All 16 core API methods/properties verified working
All 10 conductor usage patterns verified working
All 14 adversarial edge cases handled gracefully
issues: None - all tests passed and API compatibility is complete
